hero.name: M Safwan Yasin
hero.description: I am passionate about creating experiences that are engaging and user centric. Currently hunting for roles in software, frontend and mobile app development, I bring a blend of creativity and technical skills. Check out my portfolio for a glimpse of my passion in action!

about.title: I'm a developer based in Istanbul, Turkey
about.description: While purusing a degree in Computer Science from Sabanci University, I am also working as a freelance application, software and web developer. Since, I am in my last semester, I'm activly searching for job opportunities in Europe, Turkey and UAE.
